attributes.action: stop local authorities & churches selling Allotment sites for financial gain/housing development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we wish to stop local authorities and church land owners selling our valuable Allotment sites in pursuit of quick financial gain all allotments that have been used as such for 10 years or more should stay as such

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop local authorities & churches selling Allotment sites for financial gain/housing development."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14997.asp

Prime Minister's Office
